dr.evomodel.epidemiology
Class SIRModel

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.coalescent.DemographicModel
          dr.evomodel.epidemiology.SIRModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class SIRModel
extends DemographicModel
implements Likelihood

This class gives an SIR trajectory and hands off a rate of coalescence at a given point in time. SIR trajectories are simulated deterministically Transmission is frequency-dependent transmissionRateParameter is the number of contacts an infected individual makes per time unit recoveryRateParameter is the number of recovery events an infected individual makes per time unit susceptibleParameter is the number of susceptible hosts at present day (t=0) infectedParameter is the number of infected hosts at present day (t=0) recoveredParameter is the number of recovered hosts at present day (t=0)

Author:
Trevor Bedford, Andrew Rambaut
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

handleVariableChangedEvent

protected void handleVariableChangedEvent(Variable variable,
                                          int index,
                                          Variable.ChangeType type)
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
This method is called whenever a parameter is changed.

It is strongly recommended that the model component sets a "dirty" flag and does no further calculations. Recalculation is typically done when the model component is asked for some information that requires them. This mechanism is 'lazy' so that this method can be safely called multiple times with minimal computational cost.

Overrides:
handleVariableChangedEvent in class DemographicModel

storeState

protected void storeState()
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
Additional state information, outside of the sub-model is stored by this call.

Overrides:
storeState in class DemographicModel

restoreState

protected void restoreState()
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
After this call the model is guaranteed to have returned its extra state information to the values coinciding with the last storeState call. Sub-models are handled automatically and do not need to be considered in this method.

Overrides:
restoreState in class DemographicModel
